section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
The European Art Market Coalition brings together organisations representing the art market across Europe.  
 
Our group includes organisations representing dealers, gallery owners and auction houses in Germany, France, Sweden, the Netherlands, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Austria and the UK.
relevant_communication: EC proposal on the import of cultural goods
